|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Winbond;W25N01GVZEIG; |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = Fidelix;FM35Q1GA-IB; |flash2size = 128 |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Winbond;W634GG6NB-12; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = MediaTek;MT7531BE; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = C4:41:1E |oui = C4:41:1E
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = Linux;4.4.198;;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Wi-Fi 6, MU-MIMO, 1024QAM, HE80, WPA3, |addchip = PMIC;MediaTek;MT6380N;;1; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac+ax
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Wistron NeWeb |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 08/14/2020 |estreldate = 09/2020 |estprice = 150 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B08LMQLG7X |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Vietnam
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = MHF4 |rad1txchains = 4 |rad1rxchains = 4 |rad1sstreams = 4 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam1 = 800 |rad1n = 600 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = MediaTek;MT7915AN; |rad2chip2 = MediaTek;MT7975AN; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = MHF4 |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 4 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac/ax |rad2ax = 2402 |rad2ac = 1733 |rad2n = 600 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *[[Linksys E8450]] - ''AX3200 Dual Band Gigabit WiFi 6 Router'' :FCC ID: K7S-03571 (2020-08-14) • [[Linksys E8420]] ([[WNC]]) :CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7622BV @1.35GHz (ARM) :Flash: ''Fidelix'' FM35Q1GA-IB (128MB) :EUT2: [[Winbond]] W25N01GVZEIG (128MB) :RAM: [[Winbond]] W634GG6NB-12 (512MB) :EUT3: ''Kingston'' D2516ECMDXGJD-U :WLAN: [[MediaTek]] MT7915AN/MT7975AN :Switch: [[MediaTek]] MT7531BE (1GbE) :PMIC: [[MediaTek]] MT6380N; PCB: 48XKAM01.SGB
{{See also|Linksys E7350|Belkin RT3200|Wistron NeWeb}} *{{WiFiCert|WFA101434|09/03/2020}} {{FCC ST|12/21/2020}}
==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/339594430 ''Linksys E8450 Dual-Band AX3200 WiFi 6 Router'' on '''zhuanlan''' blog] :CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7622BV; Wi-Fi 6: [[MediaTek]] MT7915AN (4T4R) :800Mbps (2.4GHz), 2.4Gbps (5GHz), MU-MIMO, int. antennas :1024QAM, OFDMA, WPA3, Guest Network, DLNA Media Server :1x Gigabit WAN port, 4x Gigabit LAN ports, 1x USB 2.0 port *[https://dongknows.com/linksys-e8450-ax3200-wi-fi-6-router-review/ ''Linksys E8450 AX3200 WiFi 6 Router'' on '''DongKnows''' blog]
